posts.raw_content:
He was a great man.  Born into poverty, picked cotton, joined the army at 16 and lied about his age.  Served during the Korean War (although was stationed in Germany). 

Got his GED and later a college degree.  Built a home for his family, and taught his only son how to be a man   He was a devout Christian, life-long Republican, and just all around good guy.  Say a prayer for my family.  Thanks fellow pedes.

Got his GED and later a college degree. Built a home for his family, and taught his only son how to be a man He was a devout Christian, life-long Republican, and just all around good guy. Say a prayer for my family. Thanks fellow pedes.

Got his GED and later a college degree.  Built a home for his family, and taught his only son how to be a man   He was a devout Christian, life-long Republican, and just all around good guy.  Say a prayer for my family.  Thanks fellow pedes.
